subject: Golf
Hurricanes and Tropical Storms
PGA Championship
lead_paragraph: Hurricane Hugo forever altered the landscape of the Ocean Course, the site of this week’s P.G.A. Championship, which has since been known for its difficulty and grand scenery.
snippet: Hurricane Hugo forever altered the landscape of the Ocean Course, the site of this week’s P.G.A. Championship, which has since been known for its difficulty and grand scenery.
